mapper.sql: id, user_name, user_address, user_id, product_name, product_price, product_content, product_tag, product_create_time, product_status, create_time, update_time, is_deleted
mapper.select: SELECT t2.id, t2.product_name, t2.product_content, t2.product_price, t3.product_pic, t2.product_status, t2.user_id, t2.user_name, t4.icon, t2.user_address FROM product t2 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_pic.pid, product_pic FROM product_pic GROUP BY product_pic.pid ) t3 ON t2.id = t3.pid LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 ON t2.user_id = t4.user_id WHERE t2.product_status = 1 AND t2.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT t1.*, t2.product_pic FROM product t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT product_pic.pid, product_pic FROM product_pic ) t2 ON t1.id = t2.pid WHERE t1.user_id = #{userId} and(t1.product_status = 0 or t1.product_status = 1)
SELECT count(*) as num, DATE_FORMAT( t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as time FROM product t1 WHERE user_id = 1 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' )

SELECT t1.*, t2.product_pic FROM product t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT product_pic.pid, product_pic FROM product_pic GROUP BY product_pic.pid) t2 ON t1.id = t2.pid WHERE DATE_FORMAT( t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' )= #{time}
SELECT sum( pt.num ) FROM ( SELECT count(*) AS num, DATE_FORMAT( t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS create_time FROM product t1 WHERE user_id = 1 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) pt

SELECT t1.*, t3.product_pic FROM product t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pic.pid, product_pic FROM product_pic pic GROUP BY pic.pid ) t3 ON t1.id = t3.pid WHERE t1.user_id = #{userId} AND t1.product_status = 1 AND t1.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC

SELECT t1.*, t3.product_pic FROM product t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pic.pid, product_pic FROM product_pic pic GROUP BY pic.pid ) t3 ON t1.id = t3.pid WHERE t1.user_id = #{userId} AND t1.product_status = 0 AND t1.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
